short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn webpages to dark mode created by SOUR LEANGCHHEAN

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save your eyes and browse in comfort with Dark Mode Extension!
Transform any website into a sleek, dark theme that's easy on the eyes, especially at night.  Reduce eye strain, improve readability, and create a more relaxing browsing experience.

Key features:

Universal Dark Mode: Works on all your favorite websites!
Customization Options: Choose from mild to strong inversion, adjust brightness and contrast, or even enable grayscale or sepia mode.
Easy to Use: Simple one-click activation and deactivation from the toolbar.
Take control of your browsing experience and  Embrace the Dark Side with Dark Mode Extension!
